column1: #Text=Wan says : " You guys are hungry too , huh ? "
#Text=Wan says : " They need it more than I do .
#Text=Or worse , he 'll banish you to the Spirit Wilds .
#Text=" Yao says : " No , do n't get banished .
#Text=You do n't want nothing to do with those spirits .
#Text=They 'll get inside ya , scramble up your mind , turn you into this , a monster !
#Text=" Jaya says : " Do n't do anything crazy , Wan .
#Text=You just got ta accept the world is the way it is .
